meanings.sent2: The man jizzes when he is happy.
meanings.sent3: The cat jizzes all over the house.
meanings.sent4: The volcano jizzes hot lava into the air.

meanings.definition: To be extremely excited or enthusiastic.
meanings.sent2: The children jizzes when they see the presents.
meanings.sent3: The puppy jizzes at the sight of a treat.
meanings.sent4: The crowd jizzes with energy at the concert.

meanings.sent1: He spilled jizzes on his pants.
meanings.sent2: The doctor collected a sample of jizzes for testing.
meanings.sent3: The prankster filled the water balloons with jizzes.
meanings.sent4: The artist used jizzes as paint for the mural.
meanings.sent5: The chef accidentally added jizzes instead of cream to the recipe.
